title: Ezhu malai tANDi
sahitya:
Ezhu malai tANDi vandEn en mukham pArAi Engi migha unai aDaindEn vEnkaTEshanE


anupallavi

  pAzhulagin mAyattilE paTTadu pOdum parivuDanE enakkaruLun pAdam eppOdum


caraNam    varundi varundi manamaDanga marundu tEDinEn malai marundE kalai virundE nilai enakkaruL
arum tuNaivA unnaiyanri yArumillaiyE alamElu nAyakanE ANDaruLayyA
